segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and I can't help but feel a bit happy seeing his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, like they're the only thing that matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing him take such a risk, but I also understand his excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for a cookie, and he's trying his best to get her one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, but he's just standing there, reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, but I also remember being a kid and doing similar things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor makes it even more dangerous, but he's just focused on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he realizes the danger before it's too late, but I also hope he gets those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mix of danger and excitement, and I can't help but feel a bit nostalgic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I want to cheer him on, but also tell him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
